title: The August Update!
message: We reorganized the playlists to make your favorites easier to find. The new categories are Standard (i.e. Vanilla), Evolved (i.e. TU), Anniversary, Community, and Cooperative. We also retired some of the playlists to improve matching times.|n|nPlease visit HaloWaypoint.com for additional information, and play every weekend for your shot at a special Super Jackpot.|n|nSee you on the virtual battlefield.|n-343 Industries
